title: Myleene Klass shares sweet snap of first day back at work with newborn son Apollo

Myleene Klass has documented her return to work after maternity leave by sharing an adorable snap of herself and baby Apollo in the Classic FM studios.

The radio presenter, 41, gave fans a treat by uploading the cute image onto her Instagram account on Monday morning.

She could be seen cradling her third child in her arms as she stood in front of the microphone ready to speak on the airwaves in the offering.

Radiating beauty, the busty beauty modelled a plunging black dress and her mocha locks tumbled down her shoulders.

Apollo put on a cute display in a black T-shirt and trousers teamed with chequered plimsolls.

Making a classical music pun in the caption, the former Hear'Say singer captioned the snap: "We're Bach."

(Image: myleeneklass/Instagram)

In reference to German composer and musician of the Baroque period Johann Sebastian Bach.

Myleene welcomed Apollo on August 1 with her beau Simon Motson.

The mother of three said the arrival of her son was fraught with difficulties, and that having a child in her forties was a very different experience to giving birth as a younger woman.

Myleene was 29 when she gave birth to eldest daughter Ava, now 12, and 32 when she delivered her sister Hero, eight.

The radio presenter told Hello! magazine that after an easy beginning to her labour, the situation became more extreme.

(Image: SIPA USA/PA Images)

Myleene explained: “My waters broke and I was in the birthing pool. We had a really easy first three hours, to the point that I thought we would all be home by 7pm.

“But I don’t remember what happened next.

“I lost five hours of my life and it was a pretty complicated birth in the end.”

The former pop star has said she does not take the pleasures of motherhood for granted, and is cherishing moments with young Apollo – born on August 1 - because she knows how fleeting they can be.

“Having a baby in your 40s is an extremely different experience,” she told.

(Image: Instagram)

“I love the night feeds - it’s a privilege to look at his little face during the night. I know how quickly this will go.

“I’m loving every single minute. I even miss my baby bump.”

Apollo is the first child for Myleene and her partner Simon, 45, a fashion PR. Like her, he has two children from his previous marriage.

Myleene’s former husband Graham Quinn, father of her two daughters, walked out on her just six months after their wedding. She later admitted to turning to drink to get through.
description: The classically trained singer has returned to her radio presenting job after welcoming her new tot in August
